name: Dog (Chocoffet)
description:
This is a game about a dog who's trying to escape from his abusive owner. As you go through his adventure, you'll learn more about the story behind it. Goodluck! 

Controls:

Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J / A
B - Ctrl / K / X / B
Start - Enter
Select - Shift

Very Important Notes:

  • This is an in-progress game, so don't take the game seriously as it is not finished yet. 
  • The game may surprisingly be a short time playing it. 
  • There may be glitches/issues that may happen while playing the game.
  • There's no music, incase you're trying to adjust your volume. (Maybe)
  • The grammar might be wrong.
  • You might be triggered on some text dialogue or some scenes. (like a trauma)
  • There's flashing lights, and some shaking movement.
  • There may be some strong swearings involve.

Thank you for reading it. (If you really did read it)

I created this game by using GB Studios, so I have no knowledge of programming whatsoever. Thank you GB Studios ^^

Also, I'd much appreciate it if there are some suggestions or any feedbacks commented after playing the game, because this is my first time trying to make a game. Thank you again! ^^
